com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bg5sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bg5sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Bg5sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the BG5S

    The class provides methods to control BG5S device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a BG5S device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new BG5S device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect BG5S device.

      void disconnect()
      Disconnect device This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
      The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED). Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
      iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

        a constructor for Bg5sContorl.
        Parameters:
        com - class for communication.
        context - Context.
        mac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        deviceType - valid Bluetooth name.
        mBaseCommCallback - communication callback
        insCallback - Bg series protocol callback.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusInfo

        public void getStatusInfo()
        Get status information from BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_GET_STATUS_INFO, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.

      • setTime

        public void setTime(java.util.Date date,
                    float timeZone)
        Set time to BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_SET_TIME when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        date - Date in UTC
        timeZone - valid range [-12,12]
          Any parameter is invalid. Default values will be used.

      • setUnit

        public void setUnit(int unitType)
        Set unit to BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_SET_UNIT when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the unit type set to BG5S. Can be one of Bg5sProfile.UNIT_MMOL or Bg5sProfile.UNIT_MG

      • sendCode

        public void sendCode(int codeType)
        Send code to BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_SEND_CODE when success, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        codeType - the code type set to BG5S.Can be one of Bg5sProfile.CODE_BLOOD or Bg5sProfile.CODE_CTL

      • deleteUsedStrip

        public void deleteUsedStrip()
        Delete used strip of BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_DELETE_USED_STRIP when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.

      • deleteOfflineData

        public void deleteOfflineData()
        Delete offline data of BG5S. Please note that until you receive the full data, you can delete it otherwise you will lose it.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_DELETE_OFFLINE_DATA when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.

      • getOfflineData

        public void getOfflineData()
        Get offline data from BG5S.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_GET_OFFLINE_DATA when success, the keys of message will show in the KeyList of action.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.

      • startMeasure

        public void startMeasure(int measureType)
        Start measure.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_START_MEASURE when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        measureType - the measure type set to BG5S.Can be one of Bg5sProfile.MEASURE_BLOOD or Bg5sProfile.MEASURE_CTL

      • keepLink

        @Deprecated
public void keepLink()
        Deprecated. 
        keep in connected status.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After this operation, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is Bg5sProfile.ACTION_KEEP_LINK, when success.
        • However, when an error occurs, action will be Bg5sProfile.ACTION_ERROR.

      • getCodeVersion

        public static int getCodeVersion(int codeType)
        Get the BG5S Code version of the SDK integration.
      • This is a synchronization method that returns the result directly.
      • The Result valid range is[1,255]
Parameters:
codeType - the code type.Can be one of Bg5sProfile.CODE_BLOOD or Bg5sProfile.CODE_CTL

  • disconnect

    public void disconnect()
    Description copied from interface: DeviceControl
    Disconnect device
    • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
    • If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
      • The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED).
    • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
      iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
    Specified by:
    disconnect in interface DeviceControl

  • destroy

    @Deprecated
public void destroy()
    Deprecated. 
    Specified by:
    destroy in interface DeviceControl

  • getUpDeviceControl

    public UpDeviceControl getUpDeviceControl()
    Get UpDeviceControl's implementation.
    We recommend not use this method, use iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager instead.
    Returns:
    UpDeviceControl's implementation
    See Also:
    iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager
